alert.note: Alert for Beaufort; Colleton; Hampton; Jasper (South Carolina) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Charleston (the Southern end of South Carolina and Eastern Georgia)
info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued June 08 at 5:23PM EDT until June 08 at 6:15PM EDT by NWS Charleston
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 615 PM EDT FOR PORTIONS OF BEAUFORT...HAMPTON...COLLETON AND JASPER COUNTIES... At 522 PM EDT, a severe thunderstorm was located near Grays, moving east at 25 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect damage to trees and powerlines. Locations impacted include: Yemassee, Furman, Coosawhatchie, Gardens Corner, Grays, Hendersonville, Dale, Pineland, Sheldon, Early Branch, Cummings, Gillisonville, McPhersonville, Pocotaligo and White Hall. This warning includes I-95 in South Carolina between mile markers 27 and 51. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...<.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building. Report damage directly to the Charleston National Weather Service at 888-383-2024 when it is safe to do so.
